short_summary: Request for Proposal for Channel Maintenance Dredging
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition of Channel Maintenance Dredging of the port of Cap-aux-Meules.
full_summary:
### Annex A: Channel Maintenance Dredging of the Port of Cap-aux-Meules
#### Notice Reference
WS4075083611-Doc4075148029

#### Tender Details
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-30
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 18, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Document Update Date**: August 15, 2023
* **Contract Description**: Channel Maintenance Dredging of the Port of Cap-aux-Meules
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Contract Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a contractor to provide Channel Maintenance Dredging services for the Port of Cap-aux-Meules. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, dredging services to maintain the navigability of the waterway.

#### Tender Criteria
* **Tender Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contract Requirements
* **Location**: Port of Cap-aux-Meules, Quebec (except NCR)
* **Contract Period**: Until further notice

#### Evaluation Criteria
* **Price**
* **Technical Capabilities**

#### Contact Information
* **Point of Contact**: Gabriel Fortin-Harvey
* **Email**: gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not Available
* **Fax**: Not Available

#### Notice and Documents
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16739935?extsite=MTY3Mzk5MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachments**: Not Available
* [Click here to download the tender documents](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16739935?extsite=MTY3Mzk5MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Deadline
Submissions are due by August 18, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST. Any late submissions will not be considered.
